## Wikipedia
The source I used for the plot was this [Wikipedia page](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_members_of_the_Baseball_Hall_of_Fame). More specifically I used the third table recording each member inducted into the Baseball Hall of Fame from 1936 to 2022.
